message: Let's split it 50/50, no need for further negotiation!
I'll take a slight majority, but willing to compromise
That's a bit too generous for you, Bob! I'll propose 30 for me and 70 for you.
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'll take 35 and leave you with 65. That's my final offer!
You're getting desperate, but I'm willing to give you a tiny share
You're being ruthless, Bob! I'll propose 15 for me and 85 for you. Don't think I'm desperate, I'm just strategic!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'll take 5 and leave you with 95. It's time to end this game!
